KeyboardAvoidingView, Platform } from \"react-native\";\nimport { useNavigation } from \"@react-navigation/native\";\nimport * as Location from \"expo-location\";\nimport { Feather } from \"@expo/vector-icons\";\nimport { ScreenFlatList } from \"@/components/ScreenFlatList\";\nimport ThemedText from \"@/components/ThemedText\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\nimport { useSafeAreaInsets } from \"react-native-safe-area-context\";\nimport { Typography, Spacing, BorderRadius } from \"@/constants/theme\";\nimport { storage, CommunityTip, UserProfile } from \"@/utils/storage\";\n\nconst CATEGORIES = [\n  { id: \"recovery\", label: \"Recovery\", icon: \"tool\" },\n  { id: \"navigation\", label: \"Navigation\", icon: \"compass\" },\n  { id: \"trail_condition\", label: \"Trail Conditions\", icon: \"map\" },\n  { id: \"maintenance\", label: \"Maintenance\", icon: \"settings\" },\n  { id: \"safety\", label: \"Safety\", icon: \"shield\" },\n] as const;\n\nexport default function CommunityTipsScreen() {\n  const navigation = useNavigation<any>();\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n  const insets = useSafeAreaInsets();\n  const [tips, setTips] = useState<CommunityTip[]>([]);\n  const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);\n  const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState<CommunityTip[\"category\"]>(\"recovery\");\n  const [title, setTitle] = useState(\"\");\n  const [description, setDescription] = useState(\"\");\n  const [includeLocation, setIncludeLocation] = useState(false);\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    loadTips();\n  }, []);\n\n  const loadTips = async () => {\n    const communityTips = await storage.getCommunityTips();\n    setTips(communityTips);\n  };\n\n  const handleSubmitTip = async () => {\n    if (!title.trim() || !description.trim()) {\n      Alert.alert(\"Missing Information\", \"Please provide a title and description for your tip.\");\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const profile = await storage.getUserProfile();\n    let location: CommunityTip[\"location\"] | undefined;\n\n    if (includeLocation) {\n      const { status } = await Location.requestForegroundPermissionsAsync();\n      if (status === \"granted\") {\n        try {\n          const currentLocation = await Location.getCurrentPositionAsync({});\n          location = {\n            latitude: currentLocation.coords.latitude,\n            longitude: currentLocation.coords.longitude,\n          };\n        } catch (error) {\n          console.error(\"Error getting location:\", error);\n        }\n      }\n    }\n\n    const newTip: CommunityTip = {\n      id: Date.now().toString(),\n      title: title.trim(),\n      description: description.trim(),\n      category: selectedCategory,\n      timestamp: Date.now(),\n      location,\n      author: {\n        name: profile?.name || \"Anonymous\",\n        vehicleType: profile?.vehicleType || \"Offroader\",\n      },\n      helpful: 0,\n    };\n\n    await storage.saveCommunityTip(newTip);\n    setTitle(\"\");\n    setDescription(\"\");\n    setIncludeLocation(false);\n    setShowAddForm(false);\n    loadTips();\n    Alert.alert(\"Success\", \"Your tip has been shared with the community!\");\n  };\n\n  const handleMarkHelpful = async (tipId: string) => {\n    await storage.markTipAsHelpful(tipId);\n    loadTips();\n  };\n\n  const renderTip = ({ item }: { item: CommunityTip }) => {\n    const category = CATEGORIES.find((c) => c.id === item.category);\n    const timeAgo = getTimeAgo(item.timestamp);\n\n    return (\n      <View style={[styles.tipCard, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}>\n        <View style={styles.tipHeader}>\n          <View style={styles.categoryBadge}>\n            <Feather name={category?.icon as any} size={14} color={theme.primary} />\n            <ThemedText style={styles.categoryText}>{category?.label}</ThemedText>\n          </View>\n          <ThemedText style={styles.timeText}>{timeAgo}</ThemedText>\n        </View>\n\n        <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.tipTitle]}>{item.title}</ThemedText>\n        <ThemedText style={styles.tipDescription}>{item.description}</ThemedText>\n\n        <View style={styles.tipFooter}>\n          <View style={styles.authorInfo}>\n            <Feather name=\"user\" size={14} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n            <ThemedText style={styles.authorText}>\n              {item.author.name} ({item.author.vehicleType})\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n          {item.location ? (\n            <View style={styles.locationBadge}>\n              <Feather name=\"map-pin\" size={14} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n              <ThemedText style={styles.locationText}>Location included</ThemedText>\n            </View>\n          ) : null}\n        </View>\n\n        <Pressable\n          style={[styles.helpfulButton, { borderColor: theme.border }]}\n          onPress={() => handleMarkHelpful(item.id)}\n        >\n          <Feather\n            name=\"thumbs-up\"\n            size={18}\n            color={item.helpful > 0 ? theme.primary : theme.tabIconDefault}\n          />\n          <ThemedText style={styles.helpfulText}>\n            Helpful ({item.helpful})\n          </ThemedText>\n        </Pressable>\n      </View>\n    );\n  };\n\n  const getTimeAgo = (timestamp: number): string => {\n    const minutes = Math.floor((Date.now() - timestamp) / 60000);\n    if (minutes < 1) return \"Just now\";\n    if (minutes < 60) return `${minutes}m ago`;\n    const hours = Math.floor(minutes / 60);\n    if (hours < 24) return `${hours}h ago`;\n    const days = Math.floor(hours / 24);\n    return `${days}d ago`;\n  };\n\n  if (showAddForm) {\n    return (\n      <KeyboardAvoidingView\n        style={{ flex: 1 }}\n        behavior={Platform.OS === \"ios\" ? \"padding\" : \"height\"}\n        keyboardVerticalOffset={100}\n      >\n        <ScrollView\n            style={[\n                    styles.categoryChip,\n                    {\n                      backgroundColor:\n                        selectedCategory === cat.id\n                          ? theme.primary + \"20\"\n                          : theme.backgroundDefault,\n                      borderColor:\n                        selectedCategory === cat.id ? theme.primary : theme.border,\n                    },\n                  ]}\n                  onPress={() => setSelectedCategory(cat.id as CommunityTip[\"category\"])}\n                >\n                  <Feather\n                    name={cat.icon as any}\n                    size={18}\n                    color={selectedCategory === cat.id ? theme.primary : theme.tabIconDefault}\n                  />\n                  <ThemedText\n                    style={[\n                      styles.categoryChipText,\n                      { color: selectedCategory === cat.id ? theme.primary : theme.text },\n                    ]}\n                  >\n                    {cat.label}\n                  </ThemedText>\n                </Pressable>\n              ))}\n            </View>\n          </View>\n\n          <View style={styles.section}>\n            <ThemedText style={styles.label}>Title</ThemedText>\n            <TextInput\n              style={[styles.input, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault, color: theme.text }]}\n              placeholder=\"Brief, descriptive title\"\n              placeholderTextColor={theme.tabIconDefault}\n              value={title}\n              onChangeText={setTitle}\n            />\n          </View>\n\n          <View style={styles.section}>\n            <ThemedText style={styles.label}>Description</ThemedText>\n fellow offroaders\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n        }\n        ListEmptyComponent={\n          <View style={styles.emptyState}>\n            <Feather name=\"message-square\" size={48} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n            <ThemedText style={styles.emptyText}>No community tips yet</ThemedText>\n            <ThemedText style={styles.emptySubtext}>\n              Be />\n          ))}\n        </View>\n      ) : (\n        <View style={styles.section}>\n          <ThemedText style={[Typography.h3, styles.sectionTitle]}>\n            Browse by Category\n          </ThemedText>\n          {categories.map((category) => (\n            <CategoryCard\n              key={category.id}\n              category={category}\n              onPress={() => \"@/App\";\n\nregisterRootComponent(App);\n","size_bytes":101},"screens/AIResultsScreen.tsx":{"content":"import React, { useState, useEffect } from \"react\";\nimport { View, StyleSheet, Image, ActivityIndicator, Pressable } from \"react-native\";\nimport { useRoute, useNavigation, RouteProp } from \"@react-navigation/native\";\nimport { Feather } from \"@expo/vector-icons\";\nimport { ScreenScrollView } from \"@/components/ScreenScrollView\";\nimport ThemedText from \"@/components/ThemedText\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\nimport { AIScanStackParamList } from \"@/navigation/AIScanStackNavigator\";\nimport { Spacing, BorderRadius, Typography } from \"@/constants/theme\";\nimport { storage } from \"@/utils/storage\";\nimport { analyzeVehicleSituation, Analysis } from \"@/utils/openai\";\n\ntype AIResultsScreenRouteProp = RouteProp<AIScanStackParamList, \"AIResults\">;\n\nexport default function AIResultsScreen() {\n  const route = useRoute<AIResultsScreenRouteProp>();\n  const navigation = useNavigation<any>();\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n  const [isAnalyzing, setIsAnalyzing] = useState(true);\n  const [analysis, setAnalysis] = useState<any>(null);\n\n  const { imageUri } = route.params;\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    performAnalysis();\n  }, []);\n\n  const performAnalysis = async () => {\n    setIsAnalyzing(true);\n    \n    try {\n      const result = await analyzeVehicleSituation(imageUri);\n      setAnalysis(result);\n\n      await storage.addScanHistory({\n        id: Date.now().toString(),\n        imageUri,\n        timestamp: Date.now(),\n        situationType: result.situationType,\n        analysis: JSON.stringify(result),\n      });\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Analysis error:\", error);\n      setAnalysis({\n        situationType: \"Analysis Error\",\n        difficulty: \"Moderate\",\n        steps: [\n          {\n            title: \"Assess Safely\",\n            description: \"Exit the vehicle and carefully assess the terrain and vehicle position.\"\n          }\n        ],\n        warning: \"Unable to complete analysis. Use the SOS button to request assistance.\"\n      });\n    } finally {\n      setIsAnalyzing(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleRequestHelp = () => {\n    navigation.navigate(\"RequestHelp\");\n  };\n\n  if (isAnalyzing) {\n    return (\n      <View style={[styles.loadingContainer, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundRoot }]}>\n        <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={theme.primary} />\n        <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.loadingText]}>\n          Analyzing your situation...\n        </ThemedText>\n        <ThemedText style={[styles.loadingDescription, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n          Our AI is examining the photo and generating recovery recommendations\n        </ThemedText>\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  if (!analysis) {\n    return (\n      <View style={styles.errorContainer}>\n        <ThemedText>Unable to analyze image</ThemedText>\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  const difficultyColor =\n    analysis.difficulty === \"Easy\"\n      ? theme.success\n      : analysis.difficulty === \"Moderate\"\n      ? theme.warning\n      : theme.error;\n\n  const confidencePercent = analysis.confidence\n    ? Math.round(analysis.confidence * 100)\n    : \"N/A\";\n\n  const recoverabilityPercent = analysis.recoverability\n    ? Math.round(analysis.recoverability * 100)\n    : \"N/A\";\n\n  const recoverabilityColor =\n    analysis.recoverability !== undefined\n      ? analysis.recoverability >= 0.85\n        ? theme.success\n        : analysis.recoverability >= 0.65\n        ? theme.warning\n        : theme.error\n      : theme.tabIconDefault;\n\n  return (\n    <ScreenScrollView>\n      <Image source={{ uri: imageUri }} style={styles.image} resizeMode=\"cover\" />\n\n      <View style={[styles.summaryCard, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}>\n        <View style={styles.summaryHeader}>\n          <View style={styles.titleSection}>\n            <ThemedText style={[Typography.h3, styles.situationType]}>\n              {analysis.situationType}\n            </ThemedText>\n            <View style={styles.badgesRow}>\n              <View style={[styles.badge, { backgroundColor: difficultyColor + \"20\" }]}>\n                <ThemedText style={[styles.badgeText, { color: difficultyColor }]}>\n                  {analysis.difficulty}\n                </ThemedText>\n              </View>\n              {analysis.confidence !== undefined && (\n                <View style={[styles.badge, { backgroundColor: theme.primary + \"20\" }]}>\n                  <ThemedText style={[styles.badgeText, { color: theme.primary }]}>\n                    {confidencePercent}% Confident\n                  </ThemedText>\n                </View>\n              )}\n            </View>\n          </View>\n          <Feather name=\"alert-circle\" size={48} color={theme.warning} />\n        </View>\n        {analysis.recoverability !== undefined && (\n          <View style={[styles.recoverabilityBar, { marginTop: Spacing.lg }]}>\n            <View style={styles.recoverabilityLabel}>\n              <ThemedText style={[Typography.label, { color: recoverabilityColor }]}>\n                Recoverability Score\n              </ThemedText>\n              <ThemedText style={[Typography.h3, { color: recoverabilityColor }]}>\n                {recoverabilityPercent}%\n              </ThemedText>\n            </View>\n            <View style={[styles.progressBar, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundSecondary }]}>\n              <View\n                style={[\n                  styles.progressFill,\n                  {\n                    width: `${typeof recoverabilityPercent === \"number\" ? recoverabilityPercent : 0}%`,\n                    backgroundColor: recoverabilityColor,\n                  },\n                ]}\n              />\n            </View>\n            <ThemedText\n              style={[\n                styles.recoverabilityText,\n                { color: theme.tabIconDefault, marginTop: Spacing.md },\n              ]}\n            >\n              {analysis.recoverability >= 0.85\n                ? \"Vehicle is likely recoverable with proper technique\"\n                : analysis.recoverability >= 0.65\n                ? \"Vehicle may be recoverable, professional help recommended\"\n                : \"Professional recovery equipment/service strongly recommended\"}\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n        )}\n      </View>\n\n      {analysis.equipment && analysis.equipment.length > 0 && (\n        <View style={styles.section}>\n          <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.sectionTitle]}>\n            Recommended Equipment\n          </ThemedText>\n          <View style={[styles.equipmentGrid, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}>\n            {analysis.equipment.map((item: string, index: number) => (\n              <View key={index} style={styles.equipmentItem}>\n                <Feather name=\"check-circle\" size={16} color={theme.success} />\n                <ThemedText style={[styles.equipmentText, { marginLeft: Spacing.sm }]}>\n                  {item}\n                </ThemedText>\n              </View>\n            ))}\n          </View>\n        </View>\n      )}\n\n      <View style={styles.section}>\n        <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.sectionTitle]}>\n          Recovery Steps\n        </ThemedText>\n        {analysis.steps.map((step: any, index: number) => (\n          <View\n            key={index}\n            style={[styles.stepCard, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}\n          >\n            <View </ThemedText>\n            </View>\n            <View style={styles.stepContent}>\n              <View style={styles.stepHeader}>\n                <ThemedText style={[Typography.label, styles.stepTitle]}>\n                  {step.title}\n                </ThemedText>\n                {step.timeEstimate && (\n                  <ThemedText style={[styles.timeEstimate, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n                    ~{step.timeEstimate}\n                  </ThemedText>\n                )}\n              </View>\n              <ThemedText style={styles.stepDescription}>{step.description}</ThemedText>\n            </View>\n          </View>\n        ))}\n      </View>\n\n      {analysis.tips && analysis.tips.length > 0 && (\n        <View style={styles.section}>\n          <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.sectionTitle]}>\n            Pro Tips\n          </ThemedText>\n          {analysis.tips.map((tip: string, index: number) => (\n            <View\n              key={index}\n              style={[styles.tipCard, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}\n            >\n              <Feather name=\"zap\" size={20} color={theme.primary} />\n              <ThemedText style={[styles.tipText, { marginLeft: Spacing.md }]}>\n                {tip}\n              </ThemedText>\n            </View>\n          ))}\n        </View>\n      )}\n\n      {analysis.warning ? (\n        <View\n          style={[\n            styles.warningSection,\n            { backgroundColor: theme.error + \"15\", borderColor: theme.error },\n          ]}\n        >\n          <View style={styles.warningHeader}>\n            <Feather name=\"alert-triangle\" size={24} color={theme.error} />\n            <ThemedText\n              style={[Typography.h4, { marginLeft: Spacing.sm, color: theme.error }]}\n            >\n              Warning\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n          <ThemedText style={styles.warningText}>{analysis.warning}</ThemedText>\n        </View>\n      ) : null}\n\n      <View\n        style={[styles.disclaimerSection, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundSecondary }]}\n      >\n        <Feather name=\"info\" size={20} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n        <ThemedText style={[styles.disclaimerText, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n          AI suggestions are for guidance only. Always use professional judgment and\n          prioritize safety. If unsure, request professional assistance.\n        </ThemedText>\n      </View>\n\n      <Pressable\n        style={[styles.helpButton, { backgroundColor: theme.error }]}\n from \"@/hooks/useColorScheme\";\n\nexport function useTheme() {\n  const colorScheme = useColorScheme();\n  const isDark = colorScheme === \"dark\";\n  const theme = Colors[colorScheme ?? \"light\"];\n\n  return {\n    theme,\n    isDark,\n  };\n}\n","size_bytes":302},"components/Card.tsx":{"content":"import React from \"react\";\nimport { StyleSheet, Pressable } from \"react-native\";\nimport Animated, {\n  useAnimatedStyle,\n  useSharedValue,\n  withSpring,\n  WithSpringConfig,\n} from \"react-native-reanimated\";\n\nimport { ThemedText } from \"@/components/ThemedText\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\nimport { Spacing, BorderRadius } from \"@/constants/theme\";\n\ninterface CardProps {\n  elevation: number;\n  onPress?: () => void;\n}\n\nconst springConfig: WithSpringConfig = {\n  damping: 15,\n  mass: 0.3,\n  stiffness: 150,\n  overshootClamping: true,\n  energyThreshold: 0.001,\n};\n\nconst getBackgroundColorForElevation = (\n  elevation: number,\n  theme: any,\n): string => {\n  switch (elevation) {\n    case 1:\n      return theme.backgroundDefault;\n    case 2:\n      return theme.backgroundSecondary;\n    case 3:\n      return theme.backgroundTertiary;\n    default:\n      return theme.backgroundRoot;\n  }\n};\n\nconst AnimatedPressable = Animated.createAnimatedComponent(Pressable);\n\nexport function Card({ elevation, onPress }: CardProps) {\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n  const scale = useSharedValue(1);\n\n  const cardBackgroundColor = getBackgroundColorForElevation(elevation, theme);\n\n  const animatedStyle = useAnimatedStyle(() => ({\n    transform: [{ scale: scale.value }],\n  }));\n\n  const handlePressIn = () => {\n    scale.value = withSpring(0.98, springConfig);\n  };\n\n  const handlePressOut = () => {\n    scale.value = withSpring(1, springConfig);\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <AnimatedPressable\n      onPress={onPress}\n      onPressIn={handlePressIn}\n      onPressOut={handlePressOut}\n      style={[\n        styles.card,\n        {\n          backgroundColor: cardBackgroundColor,\n        },\n        animatedStyle,\n      ]}\n    >\n      <ThemedText type=\"h4\" style={styles.cardTitle}>\n        Card - Elevation {elevation}\n      </ThemedText>\n      <ThemedText type=\"small\" style={styles.cardDescription}>\n        This card has an elevation of {elevation}\n      </ThemedText>\n    </AnimatedPressable>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = StyleSheet.create({\n  card: {\n    padding: Spacing.xl,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius[\"2xl\"],\n  },\n  cardTitle: {\n    marginBottom: Spacing.sm,\n  },\n  cardDescription: {\n    opacity: 0.7,\n  },\n});\n","size_bytes":2211},"components/CategoryCard.tsx":{"content":"import React from \"react\";\nimport { Pressable, StyleSheet, View } from \"react-native\";\nimport { Feather } from {category.guideCount} guide{category.guideCount !== 1 ? \"s\" : \"\"}\n        </ThemedText>\n      </View>\n      <Feather name=\"chevron-right\" size={24} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n    </Pressable>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = StyleSheet.create({\n  card: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    padding: Spacing.lg,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius.md,\n \"@/navigation/ProfileStackNavigator\";\nimport { storage, UserProfile, EmergencyContact } from \"@/utils/storage\";\n\nconst COMMON_EQUIPMENT = [\n  { id: \"winch\", label: \"Winch\", icon: \"anchor\" },\n  { id: \"tow_straps\", label: \"Tow Straps / Rope\", icon: \"link\" },\n  { id: \"recovery_boards\", label: \"Recovery Boards\", icon: \"layout\" },\n  { id: \"hi_lift_jack\", label: \"Hi-Lift Jack\", icon: \"tool\" },\n  { id: \"shovel\", label: \"Shovel\", icon: \"trending-up\" },\n  { id: \"tire_repair\", label: \"Tire Repair Kit\", icon: \"circle\" },\n  { id: \"air_compressor\", label: \"Air Compressor\", icon: \"wind\" },\n  { id: \"jumper_cables\", label: \"Jumper Cables\", icon: \"zap\" },\n];\n\ntype ProfileScreenNavigationProp = NativeStackNavigationProp<\n  ProfileStackParamList,\n  \"Profile\"\n>;\n\n\nexport default function ProfileScreen() {\n  const navigation = useNavigation<ProfileScreenNavigationProp>();\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n  const [profile, setProfile] = useState<UserProfile>({\n    id: \"1\",\n    name: \"\",\n    vehicleType: \"\",\n    avatarIndex: 0,\n    vehicleSpecs: {\n      make: \"\",\n      model: \"\",\n      year: \"\",\n      modifications: \"\",\n    },\n    equipment: [],\n  });\n  const [emergencyContacts, setEmergencyContacts] = useState<EmergencyContact[]>([]);\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    loadProfile();\n    loadEmergencyContacts();\n  }, []);\n\n  const loadProfile = async () => {\n    const savedProfile = await storage.getUserProfile();\n    if (savedProfile) {\n      setProfile({\n        ...savedProfile,\n        vehicleSpecs: savedProfile.vehicleSpecs || {\n          make: \"\",\n          model: \"\",\n          year: \"\",\n          modifications: \"\",\n        },\n        equipment: savedProfile.equipment || [],\n      });\n    }\n  };\n\n  const loadEmergencyContacts = async () => {\n    const contacts = await storage.getEmergencyContacts();\n    setEmergencyContacts(contacts);\n  };\n\n  const handleSaveProfile = async () => {\n    await storage.saveUserProfile(profile);\n  };\n\n  const handlePhotoUpload = async () => {\n    const result = await ImagePicker.launchImageLibraryAsync({\n      mediaTypes: ImagePicker.MediaTypeOptions.Images,\n      allowsEditing: true,\n      aspect: [1, 1],\n      quality: 0.8,\n    });\n\n    if (!result.canceled && result.assets[0]) {\n      const updatedProfile = {\n        ...profile,\n        customPhotoUri: result.assets[0].uri,\n      };\n      setProfile(updatedProfile);\n      await storage.saveUserProfile(updatedProfile);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleRemovePhoto = async () => {\n    const updatedProfile = { ...profile, customPhotoUri: undefined };\n    setProfile(updatedProfile);\n    await storage.saveUserProfile(updatedProfile);\n  };\n\n  const toggleEquipment = async (equipmentId: string) => {\n    const equipment = profile.equipment || [];\n    const updatedEquipment = equipment.includes(equipmentId)\n      ? equipment.filter((id) => id !== equipmentId)\n      : [...equipment, equipmentId];\n    \n    const updatedProfile = { ...profile, equipment: updatedEquipment };\n    setProfile(updatedProfile);\n    await storage.saveUserProfile(updatedProfile);\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <ScreenScrollView>\n             style={styles.photoImage}\n              />\n            </View>\n            <View style={styles.photoActions}>\n              <Pressable\n                style={[styles.actionButton, { <ThemedText style={styles.actionButtonText}>Change Photo</ThemedText>\n              </Pressable>\n              <Pressable\n                style={[styles.actionButton, { backgroundColor: theme.error + \"20\" }]}\n                onPress={handleRemovePhoto}\n              >\n                <Feather name=\"trash-2\" size={20} color={theme.error} />\n                <ThemedText style={[styles.actionButtonText, { color: theme.error }]}>Remove</ThemedText>\n              </Pressable>\n            </View>\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          <View style={styles.noPhotoContainer}>\n            <View style={[styles.placeholderAvatar, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault, borderColor: theme.border }]}>\n              <Feather name=\"user\" size={48} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n            </View>\n            <Pressable\n              style={[styles.uploadButton, { backgroundColor: theme.primary + \"20\" }]}\n }]}>\n                Add Profile Photo\n              </ThemedText>\n            </Pressable>\n          </View>\n        )}\n      </View>\n\n      <View style={styles.section}>\n        <ThemedText color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n          <TextInput\n            style={[styles.textInput, { color: theme.text }]}\n            placeholder=\"Display Name\"\n            placeholderTextColor={theme.tabIconDefault}\n            value={profile.name}\n            onChangeText={(text) => setProfile({ ...profile, name: text })}\n            onBlur={handleSaveProfile}\n          />\n        </View>\n        <View style={[styles.input, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}>\n          <Feather name=\"truck\" size={20} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n          <TextInput\n            style={[styles.textInput, { color: theme.text }]}\n            placeholder=\"Vehicle Type (e.g., Jeep Wrangler)\"\n            placeholderTextColor={theme.tabIconDefault}\n            value={profile.vehicleType}\n            onChangeText={(text) => setProfile({ ...profile, vehicleType: text })}\n            onBlur={handleSaveProfile}\n          />\n        </View>\n      </View>\n\n      <View style={styles.section}>\n        <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.sectionTitle]}>\n          Vehicle Specifications\n        </ThemedText>\n        <View </View>\n        <View style={[styles.input, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}>\n          <Feather name=\"tag\" size={20} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n          <TextInput\n  Emergency Contacts\n          </ThemedText>\n          <Pressable style={styles.addButton}>\n            <Feather name=\"plus-circle\" size={24} color={theme.primary} />\n          </Pressable>\n       </Pressable>\n        ),\n      });\n    }\n  }, [guide, isSaved]);\n\n  const checkIfSaved = async () => {\n    if (!guide) return;\n    const savedGuides = await storage.getSavedGuides();\n    setIsSaved(savedGuides.includes(guide.id));\n  };\n\n  const toggleSave = async () => {\n    if (!guide) return;\n    await storage.toggleSavedGuide(guide.id);\n    setIsSaved(!isSaved);\n  };\n\n  if (status !== \"granted\") {\n      Alert.alert(\n        \"Permission Required\",\n        \"Camera permission is required to take photos for analysis.\"\n      );\n      return false;\n    }\n    return true;\n  };\n\n  const handleTakePhoto = async () => {\n    const hasPermission = await requestCameraPermission();\n    if (!hasPermission) return;\n\n    const result = await ImagePicker.launchCameraAsync({\n      mediaTypes: ImagePicker.MediaTypeOptions.Images,\n      allowsEditing: false,\n      quality: 0.8,\n    });\n\n    if (!result.canceled && result.assets[0]) {\n      navigation.navigate(\"AIResults\", { imageUri: result.assets[0].uri });\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleUploadPhoto = async () => {\n    const result = await ImagePicker.launchImageLibraryAsync({\n      mediaTypes: ImagePicker.MediaTypeOptions.Images,\n      allowsEditing: false,\n      quality: 0.8,\n    });\n\n    if (!result.canceled && result.assets[0]) {\n </ThemedText>\n      </View>\n\n      <Pressable\n        style={[styles.primaryButton, { backgroundColor: theme.primary }]}\n        onPress={handleTakePhoto}\n        android_ripple={{ color: Animated, {\n  useAnimatedStyle,\n  useSharedValue,\n  withSpring,\n  WithSpringConfig,\n} from \"react-native-reanimated\";\n\nimport { ThemedText } from \"@/components/ThemedText\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\nimport { BorderRadius, Spacing } from \"@/constants/theme\";\n\ninterface ButtonProps {\n  onPress?: () => void;\n  children: ReactNode;\n  style?: StyleProp<ViewStyle>;\n  disabled?: boolean;\n}\n\nconst springConfig: WithSpringConfig = {\n  damping: 15,\n  mass: 0.3,\n  stiffness: 150,\n  overshootClamping: true,\n  energyThreshold: 0.001,\n};\n\nconst AnimatedPressable = Animated.createAnimatedComponent(Pressable);\n\nexport function Button({\n  onPress,\n  children,\n  style,\n  disabled = false,\n}: ButtonProps) {\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n  const scale = useSharedValue(1);\n\n  const animatedStyle = useAnimatedStyle(() => ({\n    transform: [{ scale: scale.value }],\n  }));\n\n  const handlePressIn = () => {\n    if (!disabled) {\n      scale.value = withSpring(0.98, springConfig);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handlePressOut = () => {\n    if (!disabled) {\n      scale.value = withSpring(1, springConfig);\n    }\n  };\n\n  return (\n    <AnimatedPressable\n      onPress={disabled ? undefined : onPress}\n      onPressIn={handlePressIn}\n      onPressOut={handlePressOut}\n      disabled={disabled}\n      style={[\n        styles.button,\n        {\n          backgroundColor: theme.link,\n          opacity: disabled ? 0.5 : 1,\n        },\n        style,\n        animatedStyle,\n      ]}\n    >\n      <ThemedText\n        type=\"body\"\n        style={[styles.buttonText, { color: theme.buttonText }]}\n      >\n        {children}\n      </ThemedText>\n    </AnimatedPressable>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = StyleSheet.create({\n  button: {\n    height: Spacing.buttonHeight,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius.full,\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    justifyContent: \"center\",\n  },\n  buttonText: {\n    fontWeight: \"600\",\n  },\n});\n","size_bytes":2014},"utils/location.ts":{"content":"export interface Coordinates {\n  latitude: number;\n  longitude: number;\n}\n\nexport function calculateDistance(\n  coord1: Coordinates,\n  coord2: Coordinates\n): number {\n  const R = 3959;\n  const dLat = toRad(coord2.latitude - coord1.latitude);\n  const dLon = toRad(coord2.longitude - coord1.longitude);\n  \n  const a =\n    Math.sin(dLat / 2) * Math.sin(dLat / 2) +\n    Math.cos(toRad(coord1.latitude)) *\n      Math.cos(toRad(coord2.latitude)) *\n      Math.sin(dLon / 2) *\n      Math.sin(dLon / 2);\n  \n  const c = 2 * Math.atan2(Math.sqrt(a), Math.sqrt(1 - a));\n  const distance = R * c;\n  \n  return Math.round(distance * 10) / 10;\n}\n\nfunction toRad(degrees: number): number {\n  return degrees * (Math.PI / 180);\n}\n\nexport function generateNearbyCoordinate(\n  centerCoord: Coordinates,\n  maxDistanceMiles: number\n): Coordinates {\n  const randomAngle = Math.random() * 2 * Math.PI;\n  const randomDistance = Math.random() * maxDistanceMiles;\n  \n  const deltaLat = (randomDistance / 69) * Math.cos(randomAngle);\n  const deltaLon =\n    (randomDistance / (69 * Math.cos(toRad(centerCoord.latitude)))) *\n    Math.sin(randomAngle);\n  \n  return {\n    latitude: centerCoord.latitude + deltaLat,\n    longitude: centerCoord.longitude + deltaLon,\n  };\n}\n","size_bytes":1238},"hooks/useColorScheme.web.ts":{"content":"import { useEffect, useState } from \"react\";\nimport { useColorScheme as useRNColorScheme } from \"react-native\";\n\n/**\n * To useEffect(() => {\n    setHasHydrated(true);\n  }, []);\n\n  const colorScheme = useRNColorScheme();\n\n  if (hasHydrated) {\n    return colorScheme;\n  }\n\n  return \"light\";\n}\n","size_bytes":480},"navigation/GuidesStackNavigator.tsx":{"content":"import React from \"react\";\nimport { createNativeStackNavigator } from useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\n\nexport type ThemedViewProps = ViewProps & {\n  lightColor?: string;\n  darkColor?: string;\n};\n\nexport function ThemedView({\n  style,\n  lightColor,\n  darkColor,\n  ...otherProps\n}: ThemedViewProps) {\n  const { theme, isDark } = useTheme();\n\n  const backgroundColor =\n    isDark && darkColor\n      ? darkColor\n      : !isDark && lightColor\n PropsWithChildren } from \"react\";\nimport { ErrorFallback, ErrorFallbackProps } from \"@/components/ErrorFallback\";\n\nexport type ErrorBoundaryProps = PropsWithChildren<{\n  FallbackComponent?: ComponentType<ErrorFallbackProps>;\n  onError?: (error: Error, stackTrace: string) => void;\n}>;\n\ntype ErrorBoundaryState = { error: Error | null };\n\n/**\n * This is a special case for for using the class components. Error boundaries must be class components because React only provides error boundary functionality through lifecycle methods (componentDidCatch and getDerivedStateFromError) which are not available in functional components.\n * https://react.dev/reference/react/Component#catching-rendering-errors-with-an-error-boundary\n */\n\nexport class ErrorBoundary extends Component<\n  ErrorBoundaryProps,\n  ErrorBoundaryState\n> {\n  state: ErrorBoundaryState = { error: null };\n\n  static defaultProps: {\n    FallbackComponent: ComponentType<ErrorFallbackProps>;\n  } = {\n    FallbackComponent: ErrorFallback,\n  };\n\n  static getDerivedStateFromError(error: Error): ErrorBoundaryState {\n    return { error };\n  }\n\n  componentDidCatch(error: Error, info: { componentStack: string }): void {\n    if (typeof this.props.onError === \"function\") {\n      this.props.onError(error, info.componentStack);\n    }\n  }\n\n  resetError = (): void => {\n    this.setState({ error: null });\n  };\n\n  render() {\n    const { FallbackComponent } = this.props;\n\n    return this.state.error && FallbackComponent ? (\n      <FallbackComponent\n        error={this.state.error}\n        resetError={this.resetError}\n      />\n    ) : (\n      this.props.children\n    );\n  }\n}\n","size_bytes":1674},"navigation/RootNavigator.tsx":{"content":"import React, { useState, useEffect } from \"react\";\nimport { createNativeStackNavigator } from \"@react-navigation/native-stack\";\nimport { ActivityIndicator, View } from \"react-native\";\nimport MainTabNavigator from \"@/navigation/MainTabNavigator\";\nimport ChatScreen from \"@/screens/ChatScreen\";\nimport WelcomeScreen from \"@/screens/WelcomeScreen\";\nimport { storage } from \"@/utils/storage\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\n\nexport type RootStackParamList = {\n  Welcome: undefined;\n  MainTabs: undefined;\n  Chat: {\n    participantId: string;\n    participantName: string;\n    participantVehicle: string;\n  };\n};\n\nconst Stack = createNativeStackNavigator<RootStackParamList>();\n\nexport default function RootNavigator() {\n  const [isFirstLaunch, setIsFirstLaunch] = useState<boolean | null>(null);\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    const checkFirstLaunch = async () => {\n      const hasLaunched = await storage.getFirstLaunchDone();\n      setIsFirstLaunch(!hasLaunched);\n    };\n    checkFirstLaunch();\n  }, []);\n\n  if (isFirstLaunch === null) {\n    return (\n      <View style={{ flex: 1, justifyContent: \"center\", alignItems: \"center\" }}>\n        <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={theme.primary} />\n      </View>\n    );\n  }\n\n  return (\n    <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false }}>\n      {isFirstLaunch ? new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));\n  \n  const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * recoveryScenarios.length);\n  return recoveryScenarios[randomIndex];\n}\n\nexport function getScenarioByType(type: string): Analysis {\n  const scenario = recoveryScenarios.find(\n    (s) => s.situationType.toLowerCase().includes(type.toLowerCase())\n  );\n  return scenario || recoveryScenarios[0];\n}\n","size_bytes":11655},"scripts/build.js":{"content":"const fs = require(\"fs\");\nconst path = require(\"path\");\nconst { spawn } = require(\"child_process\");\nconst { Readable } = require(\"stream\");\nconst { pipeline } = require(\"stream/promises\");\n\nlet metroProcess = null;\n\nfunction exitWithError(message) {\n  console.error(message);\n  if (metroProcess) {\n    metroProcess.kill();\n  }\n  process.exit(1);\n}\n\nfunction setupSignalHandlers() {\n  const cleanup = () => {\n    if (metroProcess) {\n      console.log(\"Cleaning up Metro process...\");\n      metroProcess.kill();\n    }\n    process.exit(0);\n  };\n\n  process.on(\"SIGINT\", cleanup);\n  process.on(\"SIGTERM\", cleanup);\n  process.on(\"SIGHUP\", cleanup);\n}\n\nfunction getDeploymentUrl() {\n  if (process.env.REPLIT_INTERNAL_APP_DOMAIN) {\n    const url = `https://${process.env.REPLIT_INTERNAL_APP_DOMAIN}`;\n    console.log(\"Using REPLIT_INTERNAL_APP_DOMAIN:\", url);\n    return url;\n  }\n\n  if (process.env.REPLIT_DEV_DOMAIN) {\n    const url = `https://${process.env.REPLIT_DEV_DOMAIN}`;\n    console.log(\"Using REPLIT_DEV_DOMAIN:\", url);\n    return url;\n  }\n\n  console.error(\n    \"ERROR: REPLIT_INTERNAL_APP_DOMAIN and REPLIT_DEV_DOMAIN not set\",\n  );\n  process.exit(1);\n}\n\nfunction prepareDirectories(timestamp) {\n  console.log(\"Preparing build directories...\");\n\n  if (fs.existsSync(\"static-build\")) {\n    fs.rmSync(\"static-build\", { recursive: true });\n  }\n\n  const dirs = [\n    path.join(\"static-build\", timestamp, \"_expo\", \"static\", \"js\", \"ios\"),\n    path.join(\"static-build\", timestamp, \"_expo\", \"static\", \"js\", \"android\"),\n    path.join(\"static-build\", \"ios\"),\n    path.join(\"static-build\", \"android\"),\n  ];\n\n  for (const dir of dirs) {\n    fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true });\n  }\n\n  console.log(\"Build:\", timestamp);\n}\n\nfunction clearMetroCache() {\n  console.log(\"Clearing Metro cache...\");\n\n  const cacheDirs = [\n    ...fs.globSync(\".metro-cache\"),\n    ...fs.globSync(\"node_modules/.cache/metro\"),\n  ];\n\n  for (const dir of cacheDirs) {\n    fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true });\n  }\n\n  console.log(\"Cache cleared\");\n}\n\nasync function checkMetroHealth() {\n  try {\n    const response = await fetch(\"http://localhost:8081/status\");\n    return response.ok;\n  } catch {\n    return false;\n  }\n}\n\nasync function startMetro() {\n  const isRunning = await checkMetroHealth();\n  if (isRunning) {\n    return;\n  }\n\n  console.log(\"Starting Metro...\");\n  metroProcess = spawn(\"npm\", [\"run\", \"dev\"], {\n    stdio: [\"ignore\", \"ignore\", \"ignore\"],\n    detached: false,\n  });\n\n  for (let i = 0; i < 30; i++) {\n    await new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));\n    const healthy = await checkMetroHealth();\n    if (healthy) {\n      console.log(\"Metro ready\");\n      return;\n    }\n  }\n\n  console.error(\"Metro timeout\");\n  process.exit(1);\n}\n\nasync function downloadFile(url, outputPath) {\n  try {\n    const response = await fetch(url);\n\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}`);\n    }\n\n    const file = fs.createWriteStream(outputPath);\n    await pipeline(Readable.fromWeb(response.body), file);\n\n    const fileSize = fs.statSync(outputPath).size;\n\n    if (fileSize === 0) {\n      fs.unlinkSync(outputPath);\n      throw new Error(\"Downloaded file is empty\");\n    }\n  } catch (error) {\n    if (fs.existsSync(outputPath)) {\n      fs.unlinkSync(outputPath);\n    }\n    throw error;\n  }\n}\n\nasync function downloadBundle(platform, timestamp) {\n  const url = new URL(\"http://localhost:8081/index.bundle\");\n  url.searchParams.set(\"platform\", platform);\n  url.searchParams.set(\"dev\", \"false\");\n  url.searchParams.set(\"hot\", \"false\");\n  url.searchParams.set(\"lazy\", \"false\");\n  url.searchParams.set(\"minify\", \"true\");\n\n  const output = path.join(\n    \"static-build\",\n    timestamp,\n    \"_expo\",\n    \"static\",\n    \"js\",\n    platform,\n    \"bundle.js\",\n  );\n\n  try {\n    await downloadFile(url.toString(), output);\n  } catch (error) {\n    exitWithError(`Failed to download ${platform} bundle: ${error.message}`);\n  }\n}\n\nasync function downloadManifest(platform) {\n  const response = await fetch(\"http://localhost:8081/manifest\", {\n    headers: { \"expo-platform\": platform },\n  });\n\n  if (!response.ok) {\n    throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}`);\n  }\n\n  return await response.json();\n}\n\nasync function downloadBundlesAndManifests(timestamp) {\n  console.log(\"Downloading bundles and manifests...\");\n\n  try {\n    const [, , iosManifest, androidManifest] = await Promise.all([\n      downloadBundle(\"ios\", timestamp),\n      downloadBundle(\"android\", timestamp),\n      downloadManifest(\"ios\"),\n      downloadManifest(\"android\"),\n    ]);\n    console.log(\"Downloaded\");\n    return { ios: iosManifest, android: androidManifest };\n  } catch (error) {\n    exitWithError(`Download failed: ${error.message}`);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction extractAssets(timestamp) {\n  const bundles = {\n    ios: fs.readFileSync(\n      path.join(\n        \"static-build\",\n        timestamp,\n        \"_expo\",\n        \"static\",\n        \"js\",\n        \"ios\",\n        \"bundle.js\",\n      ),\n      \"utf-8\",\n    ),\n    android: fs.readFileSync(\n      path.join(\n        \"static-build\",\n        timestamp,\n        \"_expo\",\n        \"static\",\n        \"js\",\n        \"android\",\n        \"bundle.js\",\n      ),\n      \"utf-8\",\n    ),\n  };\n\n  const assetsMap = new Map();\n  const assetPattern =\n    /httpServerLocation:\"([^\"]+)\"[^}]*hash:\"([^\"]+)\"[^}]*name:\"([^\"]+)\"[^}]*type:\"([^\"]+)\"/g;\n\n  const extractFromBundle = (bundle, platform) => {\n    for (const match of bundle.matchAll(assetPattern)) {\n      const originalPath = match[1];\n      const filename = match[3] + \".\" + match[4];\n\n      const tempUrl = new URL(`http://localhost:8081${originalPath}`);\n      const unstablePath = tempUrl.searchParams.get(\"unstable_path\");\n\n      if (!unstablePath) {\n        throw new Error(`Asset missing unstable_path: ${originalPath}`);\n      }\n\n      const decodedPath = decodeURIComponent(unstablePath).replace(/^\\.\\//, \"\");\n      const key = path.posix.join(decodedPath, filename);\n\n      if (!assetsMap.has(key)) {\n        const asset = {\n          url: path.posix.join(\"/\", decodedPath, filename),\n          originalPath: originalPath,\n          filename: filename,\n          relativePath: decodedPath,\n          hash: match[2],\n          platforms: new Set(),\n        };\n\n        assetsMap.set(key, asset);\n      }\n      assetsMap.get(key).platforms.add(platform);\n    }\n  };\n\n  extractFromBundle(bundles.ios, \"ios\");\n  extractFromBundle(bundles.android, \"android\");\n\n  return Array.from(assetsMap.values());\n}\n\nasync function downloadAssets(assets, timestamp) {\n  if (assets.length === 0) {\n    return 0;\n  }\n\n  console.log(\"Downloading assets...\");\n  let successCount = 0;\n  const failures = [];\n\n  const downloadPromises = assets.map(async (asset) => {\n    const platform = Array.from(asset.platforms)[0];\n\n    const tempUrl = new URL(`http://localhost:8081${asset.originalPath}`);\n    const unstablePath = tempUrl.searchParams.get(\"unstable_path\");\n\n    if (!unstablePath) {\n      throw new Error(`Asset missing unstable_path: ${asset.originalPath}`);\n    }\n\n    const decodedPath = decodeURIComponent(unstablePath).replace(/^\\./, \"\");\n    const metroUrl = new URL(\n      `http://localhost:8081${path.posix.join(\"/assets\", decodedPath, asset.filename)}`,\n    );\n    metroUrl.searchParams.set(\"platform\", platform);\n    metroUrl.searchParams.set(\"hash\", asset.hash);\n\n    const outputDir = path.join(\n      \"static-build\",\n      timestamp,\n      \"_expo\",\n      \"static\",\n      \"js\",\n      asset.relativePath,\n    );\n    fs.mkdirSync(outputDir, { recursive: true });\n    const output = path.join(outputDir, asset.filename);\n\n    try {\n      await downloadFile(metroUrl.toString(), output);\n      successCount++;\n    } catch (error) {\n      failures.push({\n        filename: asset.filename,\n        error: error.message,\n        url: metroUrl.toString(),\n      });\n    }\n  });\n\n  await Promise.all(downloadPromises);\n\n  if (failures.length > 0) {\n    const errorMsg =\n      `Failed to download ${failures.length} asset(s):\\n` +\n      failures\n        .map((f) => `  - ${f.filename}: ${f.error} (${f.url})`)\n        .join(\"\\n\");\n    exitWithError(errorMsg);\n  }\n\n  console.log(`Downloaded ${successCount} assets`);\n  return successCount;\n}\n\nfunction updateBundleUrls(timestamp, baseUrl) {\n  const updateForPlatform = (platform) => {\n    const bundlePath = path.join(\n      \"static-build\",\n      timestamp,\n      \"_expo\",\n      \"static\",\n      \"js\",\n      platform,\n      \"bundle.js\",\n    );\n    let bundle = fs.readFileSync(bundlePath, \"utf-8\");\n\n    bundle = bundle.replace(\n      /httpServerLocation:\"(\\/[^\"]+)\"/g,\n      (_match, capturedPath) => {\n        const tempUrl = new URL(`http://localhost:8081${capturedPath}`);\n        const unstablePath = tempUrl.searchParams.get(\"unstable_path\");\n\n        if (!unstablePath) {\n          throw new Error(\n            `Asset missing unstable_path in bundle: ${capturedPath}`,\n          );\n        }\n\n        const decodedPath = decodeURIComponent(unstablePath).replace(\n          /^\\.\\//,\n          \"\",\n        );\n        return `httpServerLocation:\"${baseUrl}/${timestamp}/_expo/static/js/${decodedPath}\"`;\n      },\n    );\n\n    fs.writeFileSync(bundlePath, bundle);\n  };\n\n  updateForPlatform(\"ios\");\n  updateForPlatform(\"android\");\n  console.log(\"Updated bundle URLs\");\n}\n\nfunction updateManifests(manifests, timestamp, baseUrl, assetsByHash) {\n  const updateForPlatform = (platform, manifest) => {\n    if (!manifest.launchAsset || !manifest.extra) {\n      exitWithError(`Malformed manifest for ${platform}`);\n    }\n\n    manifest.launchAsset.url = `${baseUrl}/${timestamp}/_expo/static/js/${platform}/bundle.js`;\n    manifest.launchAsset.key = `bundle-${timestamp}`;\n    manifest.createdAt = new Date(\n      Number(timestamp.split(\"-\")[0]),\n    ).toISOString();\n    manifest.extra.expoClient.hostUri =\n      baseUrl.replace(\"https://\", \"\") + \"/\" + platform;\n    manifest.extra.expoGo.debuggerHost =\n      baseUrl.replace(\"https://\", \"\") + \"/\" + platform;\n    manifest.extra.expoGo.packagerOpts.dev = false;\n\n    if (manifest.assets && manifest.assets.length > 0) {\n      manifest.assets.forEach((asset) => {\n        if (!asset.url) return;\n\n        const hash = asset.hash;\n        if (!hash) return;\n\n        const assetInfo = assetsByHash.get(hash);\n        if (!assetInfo) return;\n\n        asset.url = `${baseUrl}/${timestamp}/_expo/static/js/${assetInfo.relativePath}/${assetInfo.filename}`;\n      });\n    }\n\n    fs.writeFileSync(\n      path.join(\"static-build\", platform, \"manifest.json\"),\n      JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2),\n    );\n  };\n\n  updateForPlatform(\"ios\", manifests.ios);\n  updateForPlatform(\"android\", manifests.android);\n  console.log(\"Manifests updated\");\n}\n\nfunction createLandingPage(baseUrl) {\n  const expsUrl = baseUrl.replace(\"https://\", \"\");\n  const template = fs.readFileSync(\n    path.join(\"scripts\", \"landing-page-template.html\"),\n    \"utf-8\",\n  );\n\n  const html = template\n    .replace(/BASE_URL_PLACEHOLDER/g, baseUrl)\n    .replace(/EXPS_URL_PLACEHOLDER/g, expsUrl);\n\n  fs.writeFileSync(path.join(\"static-build\", \"index.html\"), html);\n  console.log(\"Complete\");\n}\n\nasync function main() {\n  console.log(\"Building static Expo Go deployment...\");\n\n  setupSignalHandlers();\n\n  const baseUrl = getDeploymentUrl();\n  const timestamp = `${Date.now()}-${process.pid}`;\n\n  prepareDirectories(timestamp);\n  clearMetroCache();\n\n  await startMetro();\n  const manifests = await downloadBundlesAndManifests(timestamp);\n\n  console.log(\"Processing assets...\");\n  const assets = extractAssets(timestamp);\n  console.log(\"Found\", assets.length, \"unique asset(s)\");\n\n  const assetsByHash = new Map();\n  for (const asset of assets) {\n    assetsByHash.set(asset.hash, {\n      relativePath: asset.relativePath,\n      filename: asset.filename,\n    });\n  }\n\n  const assetCount = await downloadAssets(assets, timestamp);\n\n  if (assetCount > 0) {\n    updateBundleUrls(timestamp, baseUrl);\n  }\n\n  console.log(\"Updating manifests and creating landing page...\");\n  updateManifests(manifests, timestamp, baseUrl, assetsByHash);\n  createLandingPage(baseUrl);\n\n  console.log(\"Build complete! Deploy to:\", baseUrl);\n\n  if (metroProcess) {\n    metroProcess.kill();\n  }\n  process.exit(0);\n}\n\nmain().catch((error) => {\n  console.error(\"Build failed:\", error.message);\n  if (metroProcess) {\n    metroProcess.kill();\n  }\n  process.exit(1);\n});\n","size_bytes":12348},"hooks/useScreenInsets.ts":{"content":"import { useSafeAreaInsets } from \"react-native-safe-area-context\";\nimport { useHeaderHeight } from \"@react-navigation/elements\";\nimport { useBottomTabBarHeight } from \"@react-navigation/bottom-tabs\";\n\nimport { Spacing } from \"@/constants/theme\";\n\nexport function useScreenInsets() {\n  const insets = useSafeAreaInsets();\n  const headerHeight = useHeaderHeight();\n  const tabBarHeight = useBottomTabBarHeight();\n\n  return {\n    paddingTop: headerHeight + Spacing.xl,\n    paddingBottom: tabBarHeight + Spacing.xl,\n    scrollInsetBottom: insets.bottom + 16,\n  };\n}\n","size_bytes":563},"navigation/MainTabNavigator.tsx":{"content":"import React from \"react\";\nimport { createBottomTabNavigator } from \"@react-navigation/bottom-tabs\";\nimport { Feather } \"@/navigation/GuidesStackNavigator\";\nimport AIScanStackNavigator from \"@/navigation/AIScanStackNavigator\";\nimport NearbyStackNavigator from \"@/navigation/NearbyStackNavigator\";\nimport NavigateStackNavigator from \"@/navigation/NavigateStackNavigator\";\nimport FriendsStackNavigator from \"@/navigation/FriendsStackNavigator\";\nimport ProfileStackNavigator from \"@/navigation/ProfileStackNavigator\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\n\nexport type MainTabParamList = {\n  GuidesTab: undefined;\n  AIScanTab: undefined;\n  NearbyTab: undefined;\n  NavigateTab: undefined;\n  FriendsTab: undefined;\n  ProfileTab: undefined;\n};\n\nconst Tab = createBottomTabNavigator<MainTabParamList>();\n\nexport default function MainTabNavigator() {\n  const { theme, isDark } = useTheme();\n\n  return (\n    <Tab.Navigator\n      initialRouteName=\"GuidesTab\"\n      screenOptions={{\n        tabBarActiveTintColor: theme.tabIconSelected,\n        tabBarInactiveTintColor: theme.tabIconDefault,\n        tabBarStyle: {\n          position: \"absolute\",\n          backgroundColor: Platform.select({\n            ios: \"transparent\",\n            android: theme.backgroundRoot,\n          }),\n          borderTopWidth: 0,\n          elevation: 0,\n        },\n        tabBarBackground: () =>\n          Platform.OS === \"ios\" ? (\n            <BlurView\n              intensity={100}\n              tint={isDark ? \"dark\" : \"light\"}\n              style={StyleSheet.absoluteFill}\n            />\n          ) : null,\n        headerShown: false,\n      }}\n    >\n      <Tab.Screen\n        name=\"GuidesTab\"\n        component={GuidesStackNavigator}\n        options={{\n          title: \"Guides\",\n          tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => (\n            <Feather name=\"book-open\" size={size} color={color} />\n          ),\n        }}\n      />\n      <Tab.Screen\n        name=\"AIScanTab\"\n        component={AIScanStackNavigator}\n        options={{\n          title: \"AI Scan\",\n          tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => (\n            <Feather name=\"camera\" size={size} color={color} />\n          ),\n        }}\n      />\n      <Tab.Screen\n        name=\"NearbyTab\"\n        component={NearbyStackNavigator}\n        options={{\n          title: \"Nearby\",\n          tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => (\n            <Feather name=\"map\" size={size} color={color} />\n          ),\n        }}\n      />\n      <Tab.Screen\n        name=\"NavigateTab\"\n        component={NavigateStackNavigator}\n        options={{\n          title: \"Navigate\",\n          tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => (\n            <Feather name=\"compass\" size={size} color={color} />\n          ),\n        }}\n      />\n      <Tab.Screen\n        name=\"FriendsTab\"\n        component={FriendsStackNavigator}\n        options={{\n          title: \"Friends\",\n          tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => (\n            <Feather name=\"users\" size={size} color={color} />\n          ),\n        }}\n      />\n      <Tab.Screen\n        name=\"ProfileTab\"\n        component={ProfileStackNavigator}\n        options={{\n          title: \"Profile\",\n          tabBarIcon: ({ color, size }) => (\n            <Feather name=\"user\" size={size} color={color} />\n          ),\n        }}\n      />\n    </Tab.Navigator>\n  );\n}\n","size_bytes":3454},"babel.config.js":{"content":"module.exports = function (api) {\n  api.cache(true);\n  return {\n    presets: [\"babel-preset-expo\"],\n    plugins: [\n      [\n        \"module-resolver\",\n        {\n          root: [\"./\"],\n          alias: {\n            \"@\": \"./\",\n          },\n          extensions: [\".ios.js\", \".android.js\", \".js\", \".ts\", \".tsx\", \".json\"],\n        },\n      ],\n      \"react-native-reanimated/plugin\",\n    ],\n  };\n};\n","size_bytes":395},"screens/NearbyScreen.tsx":{"content":"import React, { useState, useEffect } from \"react\";\nimport { View, StyleSheet, Pressable, FlatList, Alert } from \"react-native\";\nimport { useNavigation } from \"@react-navigation/native\";\nimport * as Location from \"expo-location\";\nimport { Feather } from \"@expo/vector-icons\";\nimport ThemedText from \"@/components/ThemedText\";\nimport { ThemedView } from \"@/components/ThemedView\";\nimport { useTheme } from \"@/hooks/useTheme\";\nimport { useSafeAreaInsets } from \"react-native-safe-area-context\";\nimport { useBottomTabBarHeight } from \"@react-navigation/bottom-tabs\";\nimport { Spacing, BorderRadius, Typography } from \"@/constants/theme\";\nimport { storage, NearbyOffroader as StoredOffroader, UserProfile } from \"@/utils/storage\";\nimport { calculateDistance, generateNearbyCoordinate } from \"@/utils/location\";\nimport { getWeather } from \"@/utils/weather\";\nimport { analyzeTrailConditions, calculateImpactAssessment } from \"@/utils/conditions\";\nimport type { WeatherCondition, ImpactAssessment, TrailConditionSummary } from \"@/utils/conditions\";\nimport ReportConditionModal from \"@/components/ReportConditionModal\";\n\ninterface NearbyOffroader extends StoredOffroader {\n  distance: number;\n}\n\nconst mockNames = [\n  \"Alex Rodriguez\",\n  \"Jamie Chen\",\n  \"Morgan Taylor\",\n  \"Jordan Smith\",\n  \"Casey Johnson\",\n  \"Riley Martinez\",\n];\n\nconst mockVehicles = [\n  \"Jeep Wrangler\",\n  \"Toyota 4Runner\",\n  \"Ford Bronco\",\n  \"Land Rover Defender\",\n  \"Chevrolet Colorado ZR2\",\n  \"Ram 1500 TRX\",\n];\n\nconst MAP_RADIUS = 10;\n\nfunction getTimeAgo(timestamp: number): string {\n  const now = Date.now();\n  const diff = now - timestamp;\n  const minutes = Math.floor(diff / 60000);\n  const hours = Math.floor(diff / 3600000);\n  const days = Math.floor(diff / 86400000);\n\n  if (minutes < 60) {\n    return `${minutes}m ago`;\n  } else if (hours < 24) {\n    return `${hours}h ago`;\n  } else {\n    return `${days}d ago`;\n  }\n}\n\nexport default function NearbyScreen() {\n  const navigation = useNavigation<any>();\n  const { theme } = useTheme();\n  const insets = useSafeAreaInsets();\n  const tabBarHeight = useBottomTabBarHeight();\n  const [location, setLocation] = useState<any>(null);\n  const [offroaders, setOffroaders] = useState<NearbyOffroader[]>([]);\n  const [weather, setWeather] = useState<WeatherCondition | null>(null);\n  const [impact, setImpact] = useState<ImpactAssessment | null>(null);\n  const [trailConditions, setTrailConditions] = useState<TrailConditionSummary | null>(null);\n  const [isLoadingWeather, setIsLoadingWeather] = useState(false);\n  const [weatherError, setWeatherError] = useState(false);\n  const [showReportModal, setShowReportModal] = useState(false);\n  const [userProfile, setUserProfile] = useState<UserProfile | null>(null);\n\n  useEffect(() => {\n    requestLocationPermission();\n    loadUserProfile();\n  }, []);\n\n  const requestLocationPermission = async () => {\n    const { status } = await Location.requestForegroundPermissionsAsync();\n    if (status !== \"granted\") {\n      Alert.alert(\n        \"Location Permission Required\",\n        \"Location access is needed to find nearby offroaders who can assist you.\"\n      );\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const currentLocation = await Location.getCurrentPositionAsync({});\n    setLocation(currentLocation);\n    await loadNearbyOffroaders(currentLocation);\n    await loadConditions(currentLocation);\n  };\n\n  const loadNearbyOffroaders = async (currentLocation: any) => {\n    try {\n      let stored = await storage.getNearbyOffroaders();\n      \n      if (stored.length === 0) {\n        stored = generateMockOffroaders(currentLocation.coords);\n        for (const offroader of stored) {\n          await storage.addNearbyOffroader(offroader);\n        }\n      }\n\n      await storage.removeOldOffroaders(30);\n      \n      stored = await storage.getNearbyOffroaders();\n\n      const withDistances: NearbyOffroader[] = stored.map((offroader) => ({\n        ...offroader,\n        distance: calculateDistance(currentLocation.coords, offroader.location),\n      }));\n\n      withDistances.sort((a, b) => a.distance - b.distance);\n\n      setOffroaders(withDistances);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Error loading nearby offroaders:\", error);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const loadConditions = async (currentLocation: any) => {\n    setIsLoadingWeather(true);\n    setWeatherError(false);\n    \n    try {\n      const weatherData = await getWeather(\n        currentLocation.coords.latitude,\n        currentLocation.coords.longitude\n      );\n      setWeather(weatherData);\n      \n      if (!weatherData) {\n        setWeatherError(true);\n      }\n\n      const allTips = await storage.getCommunityTips();\n      const analyzedConditions = analyzeTrailConditions(\n        allTips,\n        currentLocation.coords,\n        MAP_RADIUS\n      );\n      setTrailConditions(analyzedConditions);\n\n      const impactAssessment = calculateImpactAssessment(weatherData, analyzedConditions);\n      setImpact(impactAssessment);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Error loading conditions:\", error);\n      setWeatherError(true);\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoadingWeather(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const generateMockOffroaders = (userLocation: {\n    latitude: number;\n    longitude: number;\n  }): StoredOffroader[] => {\n    const count = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) + 2;\n    const offroaders: StoredOffroader[] = [];\n\n    for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {\n      const location = generateNearbyCoordinate(userLocation, 10);\n      \n      offroaders.push({\n        id: `offroader_${Date.now()}_${i}`,\n        name: mockNames[Math.floor(Math.random() * mockNames.length)],\n        vehicleType: mockVehicles[Math.floor(Math.random() * mockVehicles.length)],\n        location,\n        equipment: [\"Winch\", \"Tow Straps\", \"Recovery Boards\"],\n        lastSeen: Date.now(),\n      });\n    }\n\n    return offroaders;\n  };\n\n  const loadUserProfile = async () => {\n    try {\n      const profile = await storage.getUserProfile();\n      setUserProfile(profile);\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Error loading user profile:\", error);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleRefresh = () => {\n    requestLocationPermission();\n  };\n\n  const handleReportSubmitted = async () => {\n    if (location) {\n      await loadConditions(location);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleOffroaderPress = (offroader: NearbyOffroader) => {\n    navigation.navigate(\"Chat\", {\n      participantId: offroader.id,\n      participantName: offroader.name,\n      participantVehicle: offroader.vehicleType,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderOffroader = ({ item }: { item: NearbyOffroader }) => (\n    <Pressable\n      style={[styles.offroaderCard, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault }]}\n      onPress={() => handleOffroaderPress(item)}\n      android_ripple={{ color: theme.backgroundSecondary }}\n    >\n      <View style={[styles.avatar, { backgroundColor: theme.primary }]}>\n        <Feather name=\"user\" size={28} color={theme.buttonText} />\n      </View>\n      <View style={styles.offroaderInfo}>\n        <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.offroaderName]}>{item.name}</ThemedText>\n        <ThemedText style={[styles.vehicleType, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n          {item.vehicleType}\n        </ThemedText>\n        <View style={styles.distanceRow}>\n          <Feather name=\"navigation\" size={16} color={theme.accent} />\n          <ThemedText style={[styles.distance, { color: theme.accent }]}>\n            {item.distance} miles away\n          </ThemedText>\n        </View>\n      </View>\n      <Feather name=\"chevron-right\" size={24} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n    </Pressable>\n  );\n\n  return (\n    <>\n      <ThemedView\n        style={[\n          styles.container,\n          {\n            paddingTop: insets.top + Spacing.xl,\n            paddingBottom: tabBarHeight + Spacing.xl,\n          },\n        ]}\n      >\n        <View style={styles.header}>\n          <View style={styles.headerContent}>\n            <Feather name=\"map-pin\" size={24} color={theme.success} />\n            <ThemedText style={[Typography.h3, styles.headerTitle]}>\n              {location ? \"Location Active\" : \"Getting Location...\"}\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n          <View style={styles.headerButtons}>\n            <Pressable onPress={() => setShowReportModal(true)} style={styles.reportButton}>\n              <Feather name=\"alert-triangle\" size={24} color={theme.warning} />\n            </Pressable>\n            <Pressable onPress={handleRefresh} style={styles.refreshButton}>\n              <Feather name=\"refresh-cw\" size={24} color={theme.primary} />\n            </Pressable>\n          </View>\n        </View>\n\n        <View style={[styles.mapPlaceholder, { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundSecondary }]}>\n          <Feather name=\"map\" size={64} color={theme.tabIconDefault} style={styles.mapIcon} />\n          <ThemedText style={[styles.mapText, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n            Map view showing your location and nearby offroaders\n          </ThemedText>\n        </View>\n\n        {isLoadingWeather ? (\n          <View style={[\n            styles.conditionsCard,\n            { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault, borderLeftColor: theme.tabIconDefault }\n          ]}>\n            <View style={styles.loadingContainer}>\n              <Feather name=\"loader\" size={24} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n              <ThemedText style={[styles.loadingText, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n                Loading trail conditions and weather...\n              </ThemedText>\n            </View>\n          </View>\n        ) : (weather || (trailConditions && trailConditions.recentTips.length > 0)) && impact ? (\n          <View style={[\n            styles.conditionsCard,\n            { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault, borderLeftColor: impact.color }\n          ]}>\n            <View style={styles.conditionsHeader}>\n              <Feather \n                name=\"alert-circle\" \n                size={24} \n                color={impact.color}\n              />\n              <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, { marginLeft: Spacing.sm }]}>\n                Current Conditions\n              </ThemedText>\n            </View>\n\n            {weather ? (\n              <View style={styles.weatherRow}>\n                <Feather name=\"cloud\" size={18} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n                <ThemedText style={styles.weatherText}>\n                  {weather.condition} • {Math.round(weather.temperature)}°F • Wind {weather.windSpeed} mph\n                </ThemedText>\n              </View>\n            ) : weatherError ? (\n              <View style={styles.weatherRow}>\n                <Feather name=\"cloud-off\" size={18} color={theme.warning} />\n                <ThemedText style={[styles.weatherText, { color: theme.warning }]}>\n                  Weather data unavailable\n                </ThemedText>\n              </View>\n            ) : null}\n\n            <View style={styles.severityBadge}>\n              <ThemedText style={[styles.severityText, { color: impact.color }]}>\n                {impact.overallSeverity.toUpperCase()} RISK\n              </ThemedText>\n            </View>\n\n            {trailConditions && trailConditions.recentTips.length > 0 ? (\n              <View style={styles.trailTipsSection}>\n                <ThemedText style={styles.sectionTitle}>\n                  Recent Trail Reports ({trailConditions.recentTips.length}):\n                </ThemedText>\n                {trailConditions.recentTips.slice(0, 3).map((tip, index) => (\n                  <View key={index} style={styles.tipItem}>\n                    <Feather name=\"message-circle\" size={14} color={theme.primary} />\n                    <ThemedText style={styles.tipText} numberOfLines={2}>\n                      {tip.title} - {getTimeAgo(tip.timestamp)}\n                    </ThemedText>\n                  </View>\n                ))}\n              </View>\n            ) : null}\n\n            {impact.riskFactors.length > 0 ? (\n              <View style={styles.riskSection}>\n                <ThemedText style={styles.sectionTitle}>Risk Factors:</ThemedText>\n                {impact.riskFactors.map((factor, index) => (\n                  <View key={index} style={styles.riskItem}>\n                    <Feather name=\"alert-triangle\" size={14} color={theme.warning} />\n                    <ThemedText style={styles.riskText}>{factor}</ThemedText>\n                  </View>\n                ))}\n              </View>\n            ) : null}\n\n            {impact.recommendations.length > 0 ? (\n              <View style={styles.recommendSection}>\n                <ThemedText style={styles.sectionTitle}>Recommendations:</ThemedText>\n                {impact.recommendations.slice(0, 2).map((rec, index) => (\n                  <View key={index} style={styles.recItem}>\n                    <Feather name=\"check-circle\" size={14} color={theme.success} />\n                    <ThemedText style={styles.recText}>{rec}</ThemedText>\n                  </View>\n                ))}\n              </View>\n            ) : null}\n          </View>\n        ) : !isLoadingWeather && !weather && (!trailConditions || trailConditions.recentTips.length === 0) ? (\n          <View style={[\n            styles.conditionsCard,\n            { backgroundColor: theme.backgroundDefault, borderLeftColor: theme.tabIconDefault }\n          ]}>\n            <ThemedText style={styles.noDataText}>\n              No recent trail conditions or weather data available. Share a tip to help others!\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n        ) : null}\n\n        {offroaders.length > 0 ? (\n          <View style={styles.listSection}>\n            <ThemedText style={[Typography.h4, styles.listTitle]}>\n              Nearby Offroaders ({offroaders.length})\n            </ThemedText>\n            <FlatList\n              data={offroaders}\n              renderItem={renderOffroader}\n              keyExtractor={(item) => item.id}\n              scrollEnabled={false}\n            />\n          </View>\n        ) : (\n          <View style={styles.emptyState}>\n            <Feather name=\"users\" size={48} color={theme.tabIconDefault} />\n            <ThemedText style={[styles.emptyText, { color: theme.tabIconDefault }]}>\n              No offroaders nearby at the moment. Recovery guides are available offline.\n            </ThemedText>\n          </View>\n        )}\n\n        <ReportConditionModal\n          visible={showReportModal}\n          onClose={() => setShowReportModal(false)}\n          userLocation={location}\n          userProfile={userProfile}\n          onReportSubmitted={handleReportSubmitted}\n        />\n      </ThemedView>\n    </>\n  );\n}\n\nconst styles = StyleSheet.create({\n  container: {\n    flex: 1,\n    paddingHorizontal: Spacing.xl,\n  },\n  header: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    justifyContent: \"space-between\",\n    marginBottom: Spacing.lg,\n  },\n  headerContent: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n  },\n  headerTitle: {\n    marginLeft: Spacing.sm,\n  },\n  headerButtons: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    gap: Spacing.sm,\n  },\n  reportButton: {\n    padding: Spacing.sm,\n  },\n  refreshButton: {\n    padding: Spacing.sm,\n  },\n  mapPlaceholder: {\n    height: 200,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius.md,\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    justifyContent: \"center\",\n    marginBottom: Spacing.xl,\n    marginBottom: Spacing.lg,\n  },\n  offroaderCard: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    padding: Spacing.lg,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius.md,\n    marginBottom: Spacing.md,\n  },\n  avatar: {\n    width: 56,\n    height: 56,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius.full,\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    justifyContent: \"center\",\n    marginRight: Spacing.md,\n  },\n  offroaderInfo: {\n    flex: 1,\n  },\n  offroaderName: {\n    marginBottom: Spacing.xs,\n  },\n  vehicleType: {\n    fontSize: 14,\n    marginBottom: Spacing.xs,\n  },\n  distanceRow: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n  },\n  distance: {\n    fontSize: 14,\n    fontWeight: \"600\",\n    marginLeft: Spacing.xs,\n  },\n  emptyState: {\n    flex: 1,\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    justifyContent: \"center\",\n    padding: Spacing[\"3xl\"],\n  },\n  emptyText: {\n    marginTop: Spacing.lg,\n    textAlign: \"center\",\n    fontSize: 16,\n    lineHeight: 24,\n  },\n  conditionsCard: {\n    padding: Spacing.lg,\n    borderRadius: BorderRadius.md,\n    marginBottom: Spacing.xl,\n    borderLeftWidth: 4,\n  },\n  conditionsHeader: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    marginBottom: Spacing.md,\n  },\n  weatherRow: {\n    flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    marginBottom: Spacing.sm,\n    gap: Spacing.xs,\n  },\n  weatherText: {\n    fontSize: 14,\n    opacity: 0.8,\n  },\n  severityBadge: {\n    alignSelf: \"flex-start\",\n    paddingVertical: Spacing.xs,\n    paddingHorizontal: flexDirection: \"row\",\n    alignItems: \"center\",\n    gap: Spacing.md,\n  },\n  loadingText: {\n    fontSize: 14,\n  },\n  trailTipsSection: {\n    marginTop: Spacing.md,\n  },\n  tipItem: {\n
